Hi! I love KSP's modding community and would hate to request to mods, but I was wondering if there was a mod/texture for alternate solar flares? I've seen a few in picture threads and have no clue where they get them from. I also have a request for a mod that makes the mach effects more realistic or increases the length of re-entry effects (and I know increasing the length isn't entirely realistic as it isn't travelling at almost 10km/s). I don't really need these mods, however they would make for some nice pics . Anyway thanks in advance for any help anyone will give!
